item.title: Prefix or Suffix oh-my-zsh's shell prompt
item.description: Almost every developer loves his/her cool and colorful shell, so I install oh-my-zsh on my laptops and remote servers. However, as I use similar themes of oh-my-zsh and I also have the exactly same user name, most time I could not distinguish the actual machine on which I was operating. I tried to search online about how to decorate the zsh prompt so that I can insert a machine label within it.
